items.sentence: Tom has really changed a lot since last year.

Tom and I have taken a lot of trips together.

Without your assistance, I would have failed.
I assume Tom and Mary weren\'t at your party.
I assume Tom doesn\'t have very many friends.
You can\'t kill someone that\'s already dead.
Tom was always different from the other kids.

I was pretty fortunate to be able to do that.
